title: Armed Teen Infiltrates Joint Base Andrews, Prompting Lockdown
sub_head: Vice President Kamala Harris was at Maryland military base around time of intrusion
body:
An armed teen and one other suspect bypassed a security checkpoint at Joint Base Andrews, prompting a lockdown at the Maryland military base Sunday night around the same time Vice President Kamala Harris was there, base officials said.
The two intruders infiltrated the base in a stolen vehicle, officials said. Security personnel deployed barriers to stop the vehicle, and the suspects then fled on foot.
